usage.title: Current Usage
usage.description: Track your plan usage and overages for the current billing period
usage.noData: No usage data available for this period

invoices.title: Invoices
invoices.description: View and download your billing invoices

empty.title: No Invoices Yet
empty.description: Your invoices will appear here once they're generated

error.title: Failed to Load Invoices
error.description: There was an error loading your invoices

settings.title: Billing Settings
settings.description: Manage your plan, payment method, and billing preferences

currentPlan.title: Current Plan
currentPlan.description: Your subscription tier and included usage limits

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.description: Manage your payment method, billing address, and subscription settings via Stripe
paymentMethod.noStripeAccount: No Stripe account linked. Contact support to set up billing.

billingEmail.title: Billing Email
billingEmail.description: Where we send invoices, receipts, and billing notifications
billingEmail.label: Email Address

emailPreferences.title: Email Preferences
emailPreferences.description: Control which billing emails you receive

receipts.title: Payment Receipts
receipts.description: Receive confirmation emails when payments are processed

invoices.title: Monthly Invoices
invoices.description: Get invoices emailed automatically when they're generated

usageAlerts.title: Usage Alerts
usageAlerts.description: Notify me when approaching or exceeding plan limits

help.title: Need to upgrade or change your plan?
help.description: Use the Stripe Portal to manage your subscription, or contact sales for Enterprise options.

hero.title: Migration Studio
hero.description: Shadow your incumbent mediation, monitor guardrails, and verify uplift before a full cutover.

none.title: No mirror traffic yet
none.description: Create an experiment to mirror a slice of traffic and compare results side-by-side.

draft.title: Draft experiment ready
draft.description: Finish configuring guardrails and mirror percent to start routing controlled traffic.

active.title: Mirroring {mirrorPercent}% of traffic
active.description: Experiment {experiment} is sending a controlled slice of placement traffic to Apex. Guardrails are being evaluated continuously.

paused.title: Experiment paused
paused.description: Traffic mirroring is paused. Resume when you are ready to continue collecting uplift data.

empty.title: Nothing running yet
empty.description: Start a draft experiment to mirror traffic from this placement without risking production revenue.

csv.title: Upload CSV
csv.description: Use the template export from your incumbent network to map line items.

ironSource.title: ironSource API
ironSource.description: Connect with a temporary API key to pull waterfalls and instances automatically.

applovin.title: AppLovin / MAX API
applovin.description: Authorize MAX to sync placements, instances, and floors directly.

errors.fileRequired: Please choose a CSV export to continue.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Try again or contact support.

csv.uploadPrompt: Drag and drop your CSV export here or choose a file
csv.hint: Columns should match the Migration Studio template (network, instance id, instance name, eCPM).

api.accountPlaceholder: Enter publisher or app account ID

review.helperText: Assign each incumbent instance to the matching Apex adapter before activating mirroring.

success.title: Import ready for activation
success.description: Mappings are synced for placement {placement}. You can now finish configuring guardrails and start mirroring traffic.
